children.name: Amazigh Music
children.description: Music of the Amazigh people, the indigenous people of Northwest Africa (with main hubs in Morocco and Algeria) and certain parts of West Africa.

children.name: Egyptian Music
children.description: Music of the people of Egypt.

children.name: Maghrebi Music
children.description: Western region of the Arab world, encompassing the modern countries of Algeria, Libya, Morocco, Tunisia, and the disputed territory of Western Sahara.

children.name: Moorish Music
children.description: Music of the Moors, the largest ethnic group in Mauritania.
